definition: three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
in a mess/scattered about/in complete disorder
in a difficult situation/to cut a sorry figure/scoundrel! (derog.)
to wolf down one's food (idiom); to devour ravenously/to gorge oneself
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma
jackal and wolf/ravenous wolf/fig. evil person/vicious tyrant
smoke signal indicating the presence of hostile forces
to show the wolf into the house (idiom)/to introduce a potential source of trouble
villains collude together (idiom); to work hand in glove with sb (to nefarious ends)
fire beacons on all sides (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war
Sirius, a double star in constellation Canis Major 大犬座

sentences.english: Meanwhile the Fox will come down from the mountains and will metamorphose itself into a Wolf.
sentences.chinese: 期间，狐狸会下山，会把自己变成狼。

sentences.english: While meeting financial group influence in foreign hotel to press on to the border, is because"wolf" come.
sentences.chinese: 在遇到外来饭店财团势力压境时，是因为“狼”来了。

sentences.english: Wolves and dogs can interbreed and produce offspring.
sentences.chinese: 狼和狗能够异种交配而且繁育后代。

sentences.english: From then on, the sheep of this shepherd hadn't been thieved by the wolf any more.
sentences.chinese: 从此，那个牧民的羊就再也没有被家狼叼走过了。

sentences.english: Little red hat hurried to put a big stone into the wolf's belly.
sentences.chinese: 小红帽赶快去找来大石头填到狼的肚子里去。

sentences.english: Inside the Wolf's foot, the stony horizon.
sentences.chinese: 在狼的蹄子内部，是石头遍布的地平线。

sentences.english: With that he skipped even higher up the mountain while the wolf loped disappointedly away.
sentences.chinese: 山羊说完就向山上更高的地方跳去，狼失望地跑了。

sentences.english: The postembryonic development and fecundity of P. piraticus were investigated at 6 constant temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 报道了温度对真水狼蛛发育和繁殖的影响。

sentences.english: The Wolf Man is a terrorizing half-man, half-wolf creature that strikes during the full moon.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖的狼人是一种半人半狼的怪物，在满月时分发作。

sentences.english: The Wolf Man is a terrorizing half-man, half-wolf creature that strikes during the full moon.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖的狼人是一种半人半狼的怪物，在满月时分发作。

sentences.english: Lan Yangyang sent the letter to Hui Tailang by mistake yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天懒羊羊把信错送给了灰太狼。

sentences.english: Several wolves were rending a lamb to pieces.
sentences.chinese: 几条狼正在把一只羊撕扯成碎块。

sentences.english: Rolling without any knowledge of where he went, Kwuteggrappled another wolf.
sentences.chinese: 看不清自己滚到了哪里，库泰格又抱住了另一头狼。

sentences.english: The wolf and the sheep are not qualified to talk about freedom.
sentences.chinese: 狼和羊都没有资格谈论自由。

sentences.english: A soldier in a chariot will resist the Wolf and transform the Cornish people into a Boar.
sentences.chinese: 战车上的士兵会抵抗狼，把康沃尔人变成野猪。

sentences.english: A wolf leaped out of the bushes and took the hunter by surprise.
sentences.chinese: 一只狼从树丛中跳了出来，把猎人吓了一跳。

definition: aardwolf (Proteles cristatus), a small insectivorous relative of the hyena
jackal and wolf/ravenous wolf/fig. evil person/vicious tyrant
